items.name: Flashlight
items.description:
A standard Flashlight.
Can be used to light your way in the darkness.
  • Press the Use Item button to light the Flashlight for up to 8 seconds.

"Most of the battery life was wastefully used by the previous owner."

items.name: Sport Flashlight
items.description:
A very portable Flashlight with a good grip.
Its efficient technology produces a powerful light while consuming less power.
  • Press the Use Item button to light the Flashlight for up to 8 seconds.
  • Has an increased Aim accuracy of +20 %.
  • Has a reduced Depletion rate of -11 %.

items.name: Utility Flashlight
items.description:
A sturdy but heavy Flashlight that packs a lot of power.
  • Press the Use Item button to light the Flashlight for up to 12 seconds.
  • Has an increased Beam brightness of +30 %.
  • Has an increased Blindness duration of +15 %.
  • Has a reduced Aim accuracy of -20 %.

items.name: Camping Aid Kit
items.description:
A first-aid kit containing basic equipment to treat minor injuries.
  • Unlocks the Self-Heal action.
  • Increases the Altruistic Healing speed by +35 %.
  • Starts with 16 Charges.

items.name: First Aid Kit
items.description:
A common First Aid Kit containing the necessary equipment to treat minor to moderate injuries.
  • Unlocks the Self-Heal action.
  • Increases the Altruistic Healing speed by +40 %.
  • Starts with 24 Charges.

items.name: Emergency Med-Kit
items.description:
A Med-Kit equipped with high-standard medical equipment.
  • Unlocks the Self-Heal action.
  • Increases the Altruistic Healing speed by +45 %.
  • Increases the Self-Healing speed by +10 %.
  • Starts with 24 Charges.

items.name: Ranger Med-Kit
items.description:
A large metal box containing various medical supplies used in extreme conditions.
  • Unlocks the Self-Heal action.
  • Increases the Altruistic Healing speed by +50 %.
  • Increases the Success zone of Healing Skill Checks by +14 %.
  • Increases the Great Success zone of Healing Skill Checks by +15 %.
  • Starts with 32 Charges.

items.name: Worn-Out Tools
items.description:
A small set of tools, most of them worn out or broken.
  • Unlocks the Repair action.
  • Increases the Repair speed by +50 %.
  • Decreases the Success zone of Skill Checks by -10 %.
  • Starts with 16 Charges.

items.name: Toolbox
items.description:
A metal box containing a set of basic tools.
  • Unlocks the Repair and Sabotage actions.
  • Increases the Repair speed by +50 %.
  • Increases the Sabotage speed by +10 %.
  • Starts with 20 Charges.

items.name: Mechanic's Toolbox
items.description:
A metal box containing specialized tools for mechanical work.
  • Unlocks the Repair action.
  • Increases the Repair speed by +75 %.
  • Starts with 16 Charges.

items.name: Commodious Toolbox
items.description:
A large metal box containing a variety of tools.
  • Unlocks the Repair action.
  • Increases the Repair speed by +50 %.
  • Starts with 32 Charges.

items.name: Engineer's Toolbox
items.description:
A professional Toolbox containing high-quality tools.
  • Unlocks the Repair action.
  • Increases the Repair speed by +100 %.
  • Starts with 16 Charges.

items.name: Alex's Toolbox
items.description:
A collection of tools primarily used for mechanics.
  • Unlocks the Repair and Sabotage actions.
  • Increases the Repair speed by +10 %.
  • Increases the Sabotage speed by +100 %.
  • Starts with 24 Charges.

items.name: Broken Key
items.description:
A bent and broken key. Can be used as a channel for various Add-ons.
  • Starts with 10 seconds of use.

Broken Keys cannot be used to open a Hatch.

items.name: Dull Key
items.description:
A dull, non-descript key that used to fit into something.
  • Starts with 5 seconds of use.
  • Can be used to instantly open the Hatch.

items.name: Skeleton Key
items.description:
A tarnished and crooked key that used to fit into anything.
  • Starts with 30 seconds of use.
  • Can be used to instantly open the Hatch.

items.name: Map
items.description:
A piece of parchment that maps the immediate surroundings.
  • Starts with 20 seconds of use.
  • Tracks Generators within 8 metres.

items.name: Rainbow Map
items.description:
A Map of a mysterious nature. It tracks many different types of objects.
  • Starts with 20 seconds of use.
  • Tracks Objectives, Killer's Belongings, and the Hatch within 8 metres.
